p: Some studies have suggested that SARS-CoV-2 has the capacity to escape innate immune responses but the mechanism remains unclear [ [117], [118], [119]]. Further studies to characterize the host immunity, population immunity, vaccine-induced immunity and mucosal immunity are necessary. To support the research and development, studies regarding the strength, kinetics and the duration of immunity need to be clarified. In addition, detailed investigation of the determinants of healthy versus dysfunctional outcomes is required to combat COVID-19.
